rules.description: Map fn + i, o, p  to F13, F14, F15.
Map Tab to Hyper when held
Post enter if enter is pressed alone.
Post escape if left_control is pressed alone.
Caps Lock → Hyper Key (⌃⌥⇧⌘) (Caps Lock if alone)
Map fn + i, o, p  to F13, F14, F15.
Post escape if left_control is pressed alone.
Map Left Option plus h/j/k/l to Arrows
Maps button 5 to left desktop switch, 4 to right desktop switch
Caps Lock to Escape on single press, Control on press and hold.
Map fn + i, o, p  to F13, F14, F15.
HHKB Arrow Mode (fn + semicolon/slash/open_bracket/quote to arrow keys, etc)
Post escape if left_control is pressed alone.
